title: New Updates to Carolingian UI!
content:
New version of Carolingian UI available!

Version 1.13.4 has the following updates:

  • - Restored basic support for Compact Scene Navigation and Monk's Scene Navigation (though I would love if you use my Scene Folder Navigation instead!)
  • Fixed player presence indicators on Scene Navigation items
  • Adjusted input selection styles for better visibility
  • Fix for an issue with Custom Fonts dropdowns introduced by last updates

More details and requests on Github repo or Discord
